channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Supreme Court blocks order that found Texas congressional map is likely racially biased
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court has temporarily blocked a lower court ruling that found Texas' 2026 congressional redistricting plan pushed by President Trump likely discriminates on the basis of race.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. Supreme Court has temporarily blocked a lower court ruling that found Texas' 2026 congressional redistricting plan pushed by President Trump likely discriminates on the basis of race.

(Image credit: Eric Gay)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Coast Guard changes course, reclassifies swastikas and nooses as hate symbols
item.description: The Coast Guard is reacting to reports that it had downgraded swastikas, nooses and other hate symbols in its new harassment manual. A new policy debuted overnight.
item.content:encoded: The Coast Guard is reacting to reports that it had downgraded swastikas, nooses and other hate symbols in its new harassment manual. A new policy debuted overnight.
item.dc:creator: Steve Walsh

item.title: Why Border Patrol is taking the lead in mass deportations
item.description: NPR's Juana Summers speaks with The Atlantic staff writer Nick Miroff about the increasing role of Customs and Border Protection officers in immigration enforcement operations.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Juana Summers speaks with The Atlantic staff writer Nick Miroff about the increasing role of Customs and Border Protection officers in immigration enforcement operations.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Bartlam

item.title: What former ally did Trump call a 'ranting Lunatic' this week? Find out in the quiz
item.description: This week, the quiz examines truth, drugs and scandal!
item.content:encoded: This week, the quiz examines truth, drugs and scandal!
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris

item.title: Rare earths: Federal backing and tech advances aim to help the U.S. catch up to China
item.description: Rare earths aren't all that rare. The real choke point is in processing and refining them, where China enjoys market dominance.
item.content:encoded:
Rare earths aren't all that rare. The real choke point is in processing and refining them, where China enjoys market dominance.

(Image credit: ‎)
item.dc:creator: Scott Neuman

item.title: Trump and Mamdani share a cordial White House meeting after months of trading attacks
item.description: President Trump lavished praise on New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani as the two met for the first time in the Oval Office after a history of trading political insults.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump lavished praise on New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani as the two met for the first time in the Oval Office after a history of trading political insults.

(Image credit: Jim Watson)
item.dc:creator: Elena Moore

item.title: In Miami Beach, the New York City mayoral election is an opportunity
item.description: Billboards in Times Square are inviting New York businesses to relocate to Miami Beach. They're being paid for by a Florida developer who sees the election of Zohran Mamdani as an opportunity to lure residents and businesses south.
item.content:encoded:
Billboards in Times Square are inviting New York businesses to relocate to Miami Beach. They're being paid for by a Florida developer who sees the election of Zohran Mamdani as an opportunity to lure residents and businesses south.

(Image credit: Steven Meiner)
item.dc:creator: Greg Allen

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: The CDC reversed its stance on vaccines and autism, suggesting a potential link without evidence, the U.S. presented a plan to end the war in Ukraine, NYC Mayor-elect Mamdani to meet Trump Friday.
item.content:encoded: The CDC reversed its stance on vaccines and autism, suggesting a potential link without evidence, the U.S. presented a plan to end the war in Ukraine, NYC Mayor-elect Mamdani to meet Trump Friday.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: France's pension turmoil highlights global challenge of caring for aging population
item.description: France's generous pension system has toppled governments there over questions of how to fund it. It's part of a broader problem, as nations rethink how to fund care for their aging populations.
item.content:encoded: France's generous pension system has toppled governments there over questions of how to fund it. It's part of a broader problem, as nations rethink how to fund care for their aging populations.
item.dc:creator: Darian Woods

item.title: Veterans of 1989 Panama invasion urge caution amid military buildup in the Caribbean
item.description: As the U.S. builds up forces in the Caribbean, veterans of the last major U.S. intervention in Latin America worry that the 1989 invasion of Panama may have left the U.S. military overconfident.
item.content:encoded: As the U.S. builds up forces in the Caribbean, veterans of the last major U.S. intervention in Latin America worry that the 1989 invasion of Panama may have left the U.S. military overconfident.
item.dc:creator: Steve Walsh
